IATF reminds LGUs to submit reports on cash aid implementation tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-735078 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/735078/iatf-reminds-lgus-to-submit-reports-on-cash-aid-implementation/story/ “Hinihintay po namin ang accomplishment report ng mga LGUs na nakatanggap na ng emergency subsidy program para ipamahagi sa kanilang mga constituents. So reminder lamang sa LGUs na i-transmit na ang inyong mga accomplishment reports,” said Cabinet Secretary Karlo Nograles, spokesperson for the Inter-Agency Task Force on COVID-19 response. Wed, 22 Apr 2020 11:14:49 +0800
